title: Energy Costs and Emissions Push European Steel Producer to Cut Output
summary: Via Metal MinerArcelorMittal plans to idle blast furnace No. 3 at its D?browa Górnicza plant in Poland’s Silesian Voivodeship. The steel industry giant made the initial announcement back in September, citing current and future market factors.
fullContent: Via Metal MinerArcelorMittal plans to idle blast furnace No. 3 at its D?browa Górnicza plant in Poland’s Silesian Voivodeship. The steel industry giant made the initial announcement back in September, citing current and future market factors. “The reason for this decision stems from the extremely difficult and constantly deteriorating market conditions,” ArcelorMittal Poland said on July 24. A Big Change for Poland’s Steel Industry ArcelorMittal Poland stated that work to idle the furnace is now underway. The…
